long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interact with your content ChatGPT-style using Storytell. 

Storytell's "ChatGPT with your Content" Chrome extension automatically summarizes, synthesizes, and analyzes any page you’re viewing, be it YouTube videos or website text. 

You can also chat with Storytell to ask questions about the content, like "what's the main point of this article?"

Or ask Storytell to create content for you:

• "Create an executive summary of this medical paper"
• "Turn this website into a blog post"
• "Turn this news story into a poem"
• "Create a haiku based on this YouTube video"
• "Write a LinkedIn summary from this article"

Transform your content into anything you can imagine!

Storytell also creates in-depth summaries and teases apart the many concepts contained in anything you're looking at by turning them into Story Tiles.™ Simply put, each Story Tile™ is a discrete concept pulled from the entirety of the content.
